name: ESRI Shapefile
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://www.esri.com/library/whitepapers/pdfs/shapefile.pdf</field><field name="filenameExtension">shp, shx, dbf, sbn, sbx, atx, fbn, fbx, ain, aih, ixs, mxs, prj, xml, cpg</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: The Shapefile format stores non-topological geometry and attribute information for the spatial features in a data set. The geometry for a feature is stored as a shape comprising a set of vector coordinates. Shapefiles can support point, line, and area features.
